field.name: summary
field.value: Proxying COM interfaces produces invalid proxies

field.name: description

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: From the brief look I had at this, it seems to have been there for a while but it affects only COM interfaces AFAICT.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.2''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Work Started'' to ''Resolved''.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Summary''' changed from ''Newest Build Breaks Regression in Rhino.Mocks'' to ''Proxying COM interfaces produces invalid proxies''.
